column5: * Gold close to key $1 200-an-ounce level     * Dollar index holds at 4-year highs     * Platinum drops 1 pct  silver at multi-year lows   (Updates prices)     By A. Ananthalakshmi     SINGAPORE  Oct 1 Gold extended losses on Wednesday to trade near a nine-month low and looked likely to break below the key $1 200-an-ounce level  clobbered by a stronger dollar and lack of support from top buyer China.      With the dollar at a four-year peak against a basket of major currencies  other
